remarks: For two different vertices in a friendship graph, there is exactly one third vertex being the middle vertex of a (simple) path/walk of length 2 between the two vertices as ordered triple.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 18-Feb-2018.)
statement:
frg2woteu $p |- ( ( V FriendGrph E /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. V ) /\ A =/= B ) -> E! c e. V <. A , c , B >. e. ( A ( V 2WalksOnOt E ) B ) ) $.
$d A c $.
$d B c $.
$d E c $.
$d V c $.
